item.title: More on IPv6 Firewall - EUI-64
item.description: Background In the Synology DDNS Tutorial, I have a section on setting up firewall on an ASUS AC68U Router. For a recent update on my home network, the Asus router has been replaced with two Linksys WI-FI 6 tri-band mesh routers (two MX5300 or it’s SKU MX10600-CN)ã€‚ I thought it will be easy to set up since I already
